metadata.name: skyRunner - reFresh
metadata.description:
The year is 2056. Robots are here to help us with the most mundane of tasks. 
A seemingly useless robot, despite its lack of obvious practical purpose, has been designed with a friendly and approachable demeanour, making it the perfect companion for anyone in need of a helping hand.

This is a testament to the power of technology and the ever-evolving relationship between humans and robots. It is a reminder that, even in a world where machines are rapidly taking over, there will always be a place for the human touch.

Full CGi video loop - 3840x2160px
